thoughts: Wonders if StarPack still watches over {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Feels conflicted about hunting in another wolf's territory
Wonders if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could start {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own Pack
Thinks wistfully about the Warrior Code
Is glad for {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sharp hunting skills
Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} had other wolves to help protect {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Dreams of sleeping in a crowded den
Listens for the alarm calls of birds
Quickly veers away from a cougar scent
Wakes up shaking after a nightmare
Wonders if there's anything left of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Pack
Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could have helped {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Pack more
